Description: Painted and gilded cartonnage mummy-mask; Hieroglyphic text on the fillet(name-space left blank).
Curator's comments: Bibliography: L. Miatello, 'Ptolemaic mummy masks with spells from the Book of the Dead concerning the head', JSSEA 39 (2012-13).
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
